summary: Remove license headers from all files in the API repository, following changes made in the temporal server repository. This includes removing any tooling that generates or requires license headers.
userImpact: Simplifies API repository structure and build processes by removing unnecessary license header requirements.
proposedFix: Remove license headers from all files and eliminate any tooling that generates or enforces them
resolutionDetails: License headers were removed from API files following the pattern established in the temporal server repository
keyQuote: license headers are no longer required on files. Remove from all files in the API and remove any tooling that generates them or requires them.
